errors.message: Cannot form a one to one relationship with field 'coWritten' on Author as it is already associated with field 'author'
errors.hint: Use @relation on 'coWritten' to explicitly create a relationship with this field. For example, coWritten Post @unique @relation(coAuthor). To learn more about relationships, visit https://docs.keel.so/models#relationships
